mdRecord.dcterms:title: Proposed sketches and inscription for monument to George Washington, [1800?]
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: West, Benjamin, 1738-1820
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Two similar sketches by Benjamin West shows pyramid-like structures surmounted by a statue, and inscription below. On a separate page, endorsed in later hand "Benjamin West sketches," written on reverse of a cover addressed to West at Newman Street, watermark (T. Willmott). Text of proposed inscription in Latin: Georgius Washington ; "Corpus hic tegitur ; Fama per ora volat ; Fama per Orbem resonat". Watermark (crown over armed figure), 3 pages.
